description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 22/02680/FUL: enclosure (5) in respect of demolition of existing buildings and construction of self-storage building (Use Class B8) and building for flexible light industrial (Use Class E(g)(iii)), general industrial (Use Class B2), or storage and distribution (Use Class B8) uses; with associated hardstanding, parking and landscaping amendments, vehicular access from Lower Park Road and provision of new pedestrian access from North Circular Road.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Units 1A To 1B Alexander PlaceNew Southgate Industrial EstateLower Park RoadLondonN11 1QD
